TableDefinition.Name: Food properties
TableDefinition.Description: Additional food properties. This table is deprecated. See table FoodUnitWeights which partly replaces this table for data on food unit weights.

ColumnDefinition.Description: The code of the food to which the property is attached. The provided food code should match with a code of the foods table.

The nominal weight of a unit in g, relevant for, e.g., modelled foods in the context of unit variability modelling. Note: this field is deprecated and its use is discouraged. Unit weights should be specified in the unit weights table.
Population (1 - 97 years): weight of a large portion (dependent of the unit of consumption in g (default) or kg). Used in deterministic modelling of exposure as in the IESTI equation.
Babies (8 - 20 months): weight of a large portion (dependent of the unit of consumption in g (default) or kg). Used in deterministic modelling of exposure as in the IESTI equation.
Children (2 - 6 years) weight of a large portion (dependent of the unit of consumption in g (default) or kg). Used in deterministic modelling of exposure as in the IESTI equation.
